name: Digital Thoughtography 2
description:
The "Digital Thoughtography" series consists of four 24-second artworks. Each NFT operates as an autonomous work of art though any combination of the videos can be synced into a looping multi-channel audio-visual installation. The unique collector of the first four works will be gifted the fifth and final NFT in this particular series.

The term "thoughtography" refers to the paranormal ability to psychically "burn" images transmitted from one's mind onto the surface of photographic film. "Digital Thoughtography" is the artist's attempt to burn his shadow image into the Metaverse.

The source material for these videos was originally captured by the artist in the Australian Outback, Hong Kong and Tokyo and remixed into various live A/V performances while touring internationally as Professor VJ.

Sounds by Chad Mossholder.
